5 Available Models

5.1 Anthropic Models

  • claude-3-opus (175K context)
  • claude-3-sonnet (200K context)
  • claude-3-haiku (200K context)
  • claude-haiku (alias for claude-3-haiku)

5.2 Google Models

  • gemini-pro
  • gemini-2.0-flash-thinking-exp-01-21 (experimental)

5.3 OpenAI Models

  • gpt-4
  • gpt-4-turbo
  • gpt-3.5-turbo

5.4 Groq Models

  • mixtral-8x7b-32768
  • llama2-70b-4096

5.5 Local Models (via Ollama)

Any model available in your local Ollama installation.

6 Model Configuration

---
model: claude-haiku  # Use model alias from settings.json
overwrite: false     # Skip if response exists
label: my_analysis   # Optional label for referencing
---
Your prompt here...

# Available Models

## Anthropic Models
- `claude-3-opus` (175K context)
- `claude-3-sonnet` (200K context)
- `claude-3-haiku` (200K context)
- `claude-haiku` (alias for claude-3-haiku)

## Google Models
- `gemini-pro`
- `gemini-2.0-flash-thinking-exp-01-21` (experimental)

## OpenAI Models
- `gpt-4`
- `gpt-4-turbo`
- `gpt-3.5-turbo`

## Groq Models
- `mixtral-8x7b-32768`
- `llama2-70b-4096`

## Local Models (via Ollama)
Any model available in your local Ollama installation.

# Model Configuration

```yaml
---
model: claude-haiku  # Use model alias from settings.json
overwrite: false     # Skip if response exists
label: my_analysis   # Optional label for referencing
---
Your prompt here...
```
